content.rendered:
Directed by Basil Joseph

Written by Arun Anirudhan. Justin Mathew

Star Tovino Thomas (Jaison / Martin). Guru Somasundaram (Shibu). Aju Varghese (Pothan). Baiju (S.I Sajan Antony). Harisree Asokan (Dasan). Vasisht Umesh (Josemon). Femina George (‘Bruce Lee’ Biji). Sneha Babu (Bincy). P. Balachandran (Varkey). Jude Anthany Joseph (Aneesh). Mammukoya (Dr. Sambhashivan). Sudheesh (As Self (cameo)). Surjith (Paachan). Devi Chandana (Bindhu). Arya Salim (Jesmi). Shelly Kishore (Usha). Thennal Abhilash (Kukkkumol). Bijukuttan (Kunjan). Aliyar (TV Anchor). Favour Francis (Scientist). Surya Dev (Josemon’s friend). Achankunju (Achankunju). Aseez (Thief Anto). Prathapan (Pilee). Kannur Madhu (Kannapan). Syam Cargoz (Panchayat Member). Kochappi (Kochappi). Achuthanandan (Selvan). Gopala Krishnan (Keshavan). Vishnu Soman (Hari). Pauly Chechi (Villager 1). Arun (Villager 2). Rajesh Madhavan (Shinoj , Police Constable 1). Roji P. Kurian (Police Constable 2). Anil (Police Constable 3). Gibin Gopinath (Police Constable 4). Sajal (Young Shibu). Vyshnavi Narayanan (Young Usha). Akhil Anil Kumar (Young Daasan). Rejilesh (Carol Member). Bavakka (Hospital Security). Mahamood Calicut (Co-Operative Bank Security). Vijo Vijayakumar (Hospital Attender). Ajith Wayanad (CI Police). Shornur Vijayan (Priest). Deva Nandha (Girl In Bus). Ambili (Mother In Bus). Nikhil (Bus Driver). Geethi Sangeetha (Female Doctor). Jordi Poonjar (Principal Maathan). Sagar (ECG Mechani). Azees Nedumangad (Chandran). Harish Pengan (Varieth). Benzi Mathews (Kumaran Jr.). Basil Joseph (A young politician (cameo appearance))

Language Malayalam

Producers Sophia Paul. Rohit Sangwan

Production Weekend Blockbusters
